oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mystic Memphi Invitation
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mystic Memphi; Mardi Gras; correspondence; events;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Invitation and envelope from the Mystic Memphi to the New Memphis Theatre on March 5, 1878. Ticket: 4.75 x 2 in.; and envelope abstractly shaped, 6 x 5.5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by John Jones
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: ticket and envelope, mounted, 8.5 x 11 in.
